home.title: Frontend Developer
home.desc:
Hello! My name is Veronika.

I am a design-oriented frontend developer with a keen eye for details and extensive experience in implementing design layouts.
My main focus is on React (TypeScript), but I feel comfortable with Vue and Angular as well.
